name: Finnix
headline: Financial technology solutions for Indonesian creative businesses
description: Finnix is a financial technology solutions provider for Indonesian creative businesses. We provide loans and financial management tools for event organizers, agencies, concert promoters, and others.

founders.name: Reinhart Hermanus, Founder
founders.description: Ex software engineer turned into business and product management. Worked in the fintech industry since my early career.

founders.name: Philip Moniaga, Founder
founders.description: Philip was previously Senior Software Engineer at Bloomberg LP working on data infrastructure. Before that he was a software engineer at Booking.com building flights platform. Prior to that he worked as Senior Software Engineer in Carousell building ads platform - the largest c2c marketplace in Singapore and was a Software Engineer in GDP Venture.

founders.name: Sebastian Yaphy, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder of Aigis. Previously leading the Insurance team in Alodokter and OVO, with various fintech product experience from lending to investment.

Love great and practical designs. Always love exploring new things.

# Your Complete Event Solution Starts Here
From creating your financial reports to connecting you with potential sponsors and financing partners.
[Learn More](http://finnix.id/<#product>)
[](http://finnix.id/<#>)
[](http://finnix.id/<#>)
## A passion for creating events
We have served over 100+ projects
[Financial Support](http://finnix.id/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Event Consultation](http://finnix.id/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Event Technology](http://finnix.id/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Vendor Partner](http://finnix.id/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)[Sponsor Agencies](http://finnix.id/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67792e25a17dc0ede2114b8b/677963dbd2b779b4be931a91_1.png)
### Empower your event dreams with tailored financial solutions designed to bring your vision to life.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67792e25a17dc0ede2114b8b/677963dc36542a4b55e80a04_2.png)
### Expert advice for every detail of your event, ensuring seamless execution from start to finish.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67792e25a17dc0ede2114b8b/677963db34188af862110c35_3.png)
### Cutting-edge tech solutions to elevate your event experience and captivate your audience.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67792e25a17dc0ede2114b8b/677963dbe8221903ba194c72_4.png)
### Connect with trusted vendors who bring expertise and reliability to your events.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67792e25a17dc0ede2114b8b/677963db9727a85f07970f32_6.png)
### Bridge the gap between events and opportunities with strategic sponsorship partnerships.
## Our Process
### How We Can Help
1
We help organize and structure your financial documents to meet professional standards, making you better prepared for partnerships and funding opportunities.
2
Simplify your processes with our payment tools and gain access to financial support to drive your business forward.
3
Rely on our technology, partners and expertise to efficiently plan, manage, and execute your events with confidence.
## [projectsEvents We Support![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67792e25a17dc0ede2114b8b/677967488f11cf74238c2850_Pestapora.webp)Pestapora 2022![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67792e25a17dc0ede2114b8b/67796748d4b53d00b887aacb_Bergembira%20Bersama.jpeg)Bergembira Bersama](http://finnix.id/<#>)
### Frequently Asked Questions
How does Finnix help creative businesses?
Finnix acts as your financial partner, simplifying your financial operations and offering tools for project tracking, budgeting, and cash flow management. Think of us as your virtual CFO, helping you streamline operations and connect with tailored financing solutions to grow your business.
Who can use Finnix?
Finnix is designed to cater to businesses in the creative industry. We are focusing on event organizers, production houses, and advertising agencies as our primary clients. Whether you're planning large-scale events, producing creative content, or managing advertising campaigns, Finnix provides the technology and financial solutions needed to streamline your operations and grow your business effectively.
How can Finnix help with finances?
Finnix assists in preparing professional financial documents to enhance your business credibility. We also collaborate with Cicil, a licensed P2P lending platform, and various BPRs to provide project-based loans with fixed tenure schemes, tailored to your needs.
How does Finnix ensure secure financial transactions?
Finnix prioritizes security by verifying all financial documents, conducting thorough risk assessments, and making direct payments to verified vendors. Our robust risk management process ensures safe and reliable financial operations for your projects.
### Still have a question?
Don't hesitate to contact us!
Contact
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67792e25a17dc0ede2114b8b/677964eb8f11cf74238a7068_Finnix%20200.png)](http://finnix.id/</>)

generated_description:
**Finnix: Empowering Indonesian Creative Businesses with Financial Innovation**

Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's W22 batch, Finnix is on a mission to revolutionize the financial landscape for Indonesia's vibrant creative sector. Situated in Jakarta, the company leverages technology to provide tailored financial solutions designed specifically for event organizers, agencies, concert promoters, and other creative enterprises.

**What does Finnix do?**

At its core, Finnix offers loans and financial management tools that help businesses streamline their operations. They specialize in preparing essential financial documents, ensuring that clients not only look good on paper but are also ready to seize funding opportunities. With over 100 projects under their belt, they act like a financial partner—think of them as your virtual CFO—giving clients the tools needed for effective project tracking, budgeting, and cash flow management.

**Services and Solutions**

Finnix provides services that range from financial support to event consultation and technology solutions. They focus on:

1. **Financial Structuring**: Organizing financial documents to meet professional standards.
2. **Simplifying Transactions**: Offering payment tools and connecting clients with financial resources.
3. **Event Management**: Utilizing their technology and partnerships to help manage events seamlessly.

They also collaborate with Cicil, a licensed peer-to-peer lending platform, to offer customized, project-based loans, thus bridging the financial gap for creative projects.

**Why Finnix?**

For businesses in the creative industry, especially those planning large-scale events, Finnix stands out because it combines financial expertise with a deep understanding of the creative world. They focus on security by verifying financial documents and conducting thorough risk assessments, ensuring safe and reliable transactions.

**A Community of Creativity**

With a dedicated team of 13 and backed by industry partners like Gustaf Alstromer, Finnix is carving a niche in a market that thrives on innovation and creativity. By connecting businesses with trusted vendors and sponsors, Finnix aims to unlock new opportunities for growth and partnership.

For more information, check out their website: [Finnix](http://finnix.id).
